body:
Latest release version is **3.2**

### Downloads

Download C/C++ headers and pre-compiled binaries for your operating system:

* [Linux (self-extracting archive)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.2-Linux.sh)
* [Linux (tarball)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.2-Linux.tar.gz)
* [Windows (installer)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.2-win32.exe)
* [Windows (ZIP archive)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.2-win32.zip)

Older versions can be found [here](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/tree/downloads).

***

### About

GDK is a library that allows one to write game modes for SA:MP in C++ or plain C rather than in Pawn. It is basically a layer on top of the official plugin SDK that provides an ability for plugins to call server's  native functions and react on various events (callbacks) just like Pawn scripts do.

[Donate](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=T8B6KQ4XFAJLC)
name: sampgdk
tagline: Writing SA-MP game modes in C/C++
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
